input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 8' Pre-lit Flocked Victoria Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Kurt Adler 9-Foot Sierra Green Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Colorado Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 12" Pre-Lit Flocked Red Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Puleo International 6 ft. x 9 in. Pre-Lit Magnolia Artificial Garland'
  - Name='9' x 10" Decorated Christmas Garland with 180 Tips'
  - Name='36 in. x 26 in. Christmas Tree Arbor 4-Piece Set with LED Lights and Garland'
  - Name='Brite Star 10 Ft. Lighted Garland'
  - Name='6 ft. Green Pre-Lit Artificial Grass Garland with 35 LED Lights'
  - Name='HomPlanti 6' Frosted Artificial Christmas Garland with Pinecones and 50 Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='Frontgate Holiday Collection 33056 6 Foot Trad Clear Pre-lit Christmas'
  - Name='Lexington Fir 9ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 6ft Pre-Lit Premium Mountain Meadow Artificial Holiday Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Pre-Lit Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='50 ft Long Pre-Lit Christmas Garland Pathway Lights 400 5mm Warm White LED Lights Garland-Pathway'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm Newberry Pine Artificial Trees'
  - Name='Village Lighting Magnolia Leaf 9 ft. Pre-Lit LED Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 8' Pre-lit Flocked Victoria Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length and pre-lit pine garland with flocked finish; although species is Victoria Pine not Carolina Pine, overall very close in function and design.
Same length and type (green garland) but lacks indication of pre-lit or specific pine species; likely simpler and less specialized.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Colorado Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine garland like reference but no pre-lit feature mentioned; similar intended use and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 12" Pre-Lit Flocked Red Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland but species is Red Pine and flocked, differs somewhat from natural look; still a close functional match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6 ft. x 9 in. Pre-Lit Magnolia Artificial Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland but made from magnolia, smaller length and different foliage type; less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 9' x 10" Decorated Christmas Garland with 180 Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length and decorated garland but lacks detail on species or lighting type; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 36 in. x 26 in. Christmas Tree Arbor 4-Piece Set with LED Lights and Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes garland as part of an arbor set; product is different in function and size focus, less relevant.
Slightly longer lighted garland, but lacks detail on species or branch type; functionally similar pre-lit garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6 ft. Green Pre-Lit Artificial Grass Garland with 35 LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland but made from grass rather than pine or fir; very different silhouette and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HomPlanti 6' Frosted Artificial Christmas Garland with Pinecones and 50 Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland decorated with pinecones; shorter length and frosted tips but reasonably close usage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Frontgate Holiday Collection 33056 6 Foot Trad Clear Pre-lit Christmas
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit Christmas garland but only 6 ft and unclear foliage type; moderate relevance based on lighting and general garland use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lexington Fir 9ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and species type fir garland that is pre-lit; very close to reference product in function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill 6ft Pre-Lit Premium Mountain Meadow Artificial Holiday Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium pre-lit artificial garland of similar nature but shorter length and different model/species; fairly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Pre-Lit Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland similar in use and construction; species differs but still close in purpose and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 50 ft Long Pre-Lit Christmas Garland Pathway Lights 400 5mm Warm White LED Lights Garland-Pathway
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland but extremely longer length designed for pathway lighting; differs in scale and likely construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm Newberry Pine Artificial Trees
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial trees rather than garland; different product category with dissimilar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Village Lighting Magnolia Leaf 9 ft. Pre-Lit LED Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland with same length but made of magnolia leaves, not pine or fir; differs in silhouette and style.
